post:
Merry Christmas one and all.

Free for all offer thread, post any offers you want, no price limit, post as many as you want but please keep them all in this thread.

Buyers: Do your due diligence.

I will index as many as I can on this post, if you post a ton of different products/offers I will just make general reference to it rather than including specs etc.

Starts: NOW
Ends 02nd January 2021
